item.title: UAS Raichur to host 3-day international conference from December 29
item.description:
<![CDATA[The University of Agriculture Science (UAS), Raichur, and National Agricultural Development Cooperative Ltd. (NADCL), Baramulla, Jammu and Kashmir, are jointly organising a three-day international conference on “Sustainable Innovations in Agriculture, Veterinary, and Allied Sciences” (both online and offline) at the University of Agricultural Sciences, Raichur, from December 29 to 31.
Jagruti B. Deshmanya, conference organising chairman and administrative officer, UAS, Raichur, said on Saturday...]]>
